code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant TG as Telegram
    participant Web as Webhook Server (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    participant App as UseCase: EvaluateMsg
    participant LLM as LLM Client
    participant MCP as MCP Client

    TG->>Web: POST /webhook (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Web->>App: HandleUpdate(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    App->>App: Gate (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    App->>App: RateLimit & Moderation check
    alt Engine = LLM
        App->>LLM: Analyze(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        LLM-->>App: summary/eval
    else Engine = MCP
        App->>MCP: call tools (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        MCP-->>App: tool results
    else Engine = Hybrid
        App->>MCP: context snippets
        MCP-->>App: evidence
        App->>LLM: Synthesize(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        LLM-->>App: final answer
    end
    App-->>Web: reply text
    Web-->>TG: sendMessage
